summary: REQ-21 fade-in on Play appears implemented in ProposeDayPage.tsx with requestAnimationFrame, reduced-motion shortening, and mute/volume respect. REQ-20 updates the <audio> src to a new Chaar Kadam male-portion filename, but the diff does not show the required audio file being added under frontend/public/assets/audio/.

missing_requirements.requirement: A single audio file containing the male-sung portion of “Chaar Kadam” exists under `frontend/public/assets/audio/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and no evidence of an audio asset being added to `frontend/public/assets/audio/`; only the code reference was updated to point to `/assets/audio/chaar-kadam-male-portion.mp3`.
